tbSymptoms.symptomOne: I have a fever for two weeks or more.
tbSymptoms.symptomThree: My sputum is mixed with blood
tbSymptoms.symptomFive: I suffer from chest pain constantly
tbSymptoms.symptomSix: I suffer from back pain constantly
tbSymptoms.symptomSeven: I feel a shortness of breath
tbSymptoms.symptomNine: My body feels like always tired
tbSymptoms.symptomTen: Around my armpits and neck, lumps appeared
tbSymptoms.symptomEleven: I cough continously from two weeks to four weeks
tbSymptoms.symptomThirteen: I experienced a loss of apetite

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer & Terms
disclaimer.alert: Please read the terms and conditions before using this application!
disclaimer.initial: Even though this application is made based on available data and the opinion of the pertaining experts, this application is still not a fully correct way to diagnose yourself with. You can use this application as a first-aid kind of situation if you need to get to know about your condition as fast as possible. This application is made for research and educational purposes only.
disclaimer.privacy: In this website, we use cookies in order to store your color mode preferences. We do not use your data for anything. As for licenses, all of the usages are cited properly, either in this app or in the repository.
disclaimer.warning: This application IS NOT to be construed as a complete medical advice. Consult a medical expert in your area if you need to diagnose yourself in a more detailed way that is more catered to your needs. Use this tool with responsibility. If you need a specialized medical advice for your condition, DO NOT USE THIS APPLICATION.
disclaimer.license: This software is provided "as is", without warranty of any kind, express or implied, including but not limited to the warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose and noninfringement. In no event shall the authors or copyright holders be liable for any claim, damages or other liability, whether in an action of contract, tort or otherwise, arising from, out of or in connection with the software or the use or other dealings in the software.
disclaimer.agreement: Please check below boxes to continue with this application.
disclaimer.understand: I understand the terms written above.
disclaimer.responsibility: All of the usage is my own responsibility.

inference.title: Inference Result
inference.verdictCalculation: The calculation was done by using the Forward Chaining Algorithm and provides above result.
inference.probabilityCalculation: The calculation was done by using the Certainty Factor Algorithm and provides above result.
